H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H4733.def: = a place providing temporary safety to people who have been accused of murder, ► so that they cannot be killed by an avenger and their case can be properly been judged in court

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H7523.def: = causative action by which humans take the life of other humans, whether or not intentionally

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H7684.def: = action by which humans act wrongly, though without the intention to do so

H1097.def: = particle marking a proposition as not true

H1847.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H5127.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H4733.def: = a place providing temporary safety to people who have been accused of murder, ► so that they cannot be killed by an avenger and their case can be properly been judged in court

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H5127.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H6607.def: literally: opening up of words; hence: = causative process by which deities make words easier to understand

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H7291.def: = action by which humans go behind (other) humans or animals, usually at an increased speed

H5462.def: = causative action by which humans or deities close the entrance to a space with the help of a {L:door<SDBH:דֶּלֶת>}

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H1097.def: = particle marking a proposition as not true

H1847.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H8543.def: = reference to the day before the current day; sometimes used to refer to a point of time in the recent past as if it happened the day before

H8130.def: = state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

58.gl: (what used to be done) before, in the past

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H227.def: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

H7523.def: = causative action by which humans take the life of other humans, whether or not intentionally

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H5127.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6943.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Naphtali<SDBH:נַפְתָּלִי>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Gershon<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁון>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>} as town of refuge; later captured by {L:Tiglath-Pileser<SDBH:תִּגְלַת פִּלְאֶסֶר>}

H1551.def: meaning unsure, possibly: = a small circular band of precious metal, ► used for hanging curtains

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H5321.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7927.def: = the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7153.def: = town, later known as {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>}; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; named after one of the {L:Anakites<SDBH:עֲנָק>}

H2275.def: = town, formerly known as {L:Kiriath-Arba<SDBH:קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3383.def: = river; ◄ flowing from Mount {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>} in a southerly direction through the {L:Sea of Galilee<SDBH:כִּנֶּרֶת>} into the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H4217.def: literally: the rising  (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun

H4334.def: = an area of fairly level, high ground; ≈ sometimes associated with a lack of obstacles, both literally and figuratively

H7205.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ first son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7216.def: = hard stony substance secreted by certain colonial marine animals as an external skeleton, typically forming large reefs; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable

H1568.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Makir<SDBH:מָכִיר>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► settler of the area on the east side of the {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}

H1410.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, slave of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1474.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Bashan<SDBH:בָּשָׁן>}; territory of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, east of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Gershon<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁון>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>} as town of refuge

H1316.def: = region; ◄ north-east of the River {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}, ► at one time ruled by king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>}, later assigned to half of the tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}
